Name: Easy Game Creator
About the game: Follow these simple steps to make your game in minutes: Please keep in mind that the purchase of Easy Game Creator comes with 2 export licenses and that further in-store purchases are required for more game exports (you will still be able to create and test as many of your creations as you want) Pick your theme This determines the overall setting for your game, changing the visual to available cut-scenes. Each theme comes with a convenient story and order events that you can use as a base. You can completely change every aspect of this story or order events so you can be as creative as you want! Add your family and friends Include as many of your friends and family as characters in your game. Make them a hero, villain, magician, comical bad guy, or one of many other options. Choose from multiple scenarios, backdrops and gameplay Pick from multiple game elements to truly customize the experience. Have your characters go on a walk, share some friendly banter, defend themselves from hordes of enemies, and use relatable images to tell your unique story! Add custom dialog with sounds and emotes Completely customize the story with extra flare! Add as many lines of dialog to any cutscene you want, with character emotes and multiple sounds to choose from. Don't forget to add in multiple inside jokes to truly make this experience memorable! Share your unique experience instantly! In just a few clicks, share your game instantly to your friends and family so they can play it on any HTML5 compatible web browser. We create a shareable link that you can send to them through email at any time you want. Do I need any programming skills to build this game? Absolutely not! Just fill out a short questionnaire, and the game will be created for you. How long will it take from start to finish? Most people can create their gift in less than fifteen minutes.
